QuestData.Title: Fashion History and a Philosophy of Style
QuestData.Description: Greetings, $n. I am a fashion historian and I have astonishing advancements in tailoring, leatherworking, and blacksmithing that I must share with you. Why? $b$bA true legend is only as good as their ability to form an epic silhouette on the battlefield and--let's be honest--this is not where you shine. $b$bSpeak to me again if you wish to learn.
QuestData.LogDescription: Learn from Eliezer Hammerbeard how to create "flair and drama" in your wardrobe.

Objectives.Objective: Listen to Eliezer's manifesto on style.
